steps: Navigate to Settings > Leave > Leave Policies
Edit Leave Policy and toggle 'Leave Salary Settings'
Go to Payroll Settings and select 'Leave Salary Policy'
Define Policy Name and add Policy Description
Configure leave salary calculation formula and select allowance components
Add eligible employees, applying probation restrictions if needed
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Leave salary policy is configured with correct parameters, eligible employees are added, and policy is active from the activation date.

steps: Review pending leave salary requests and check eligibility
Approve or reject requests; optionally overwrite approved amounts before final approval
Add approved amounts to payroll table
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Leave salary requests are reviewed, approved or rejected correctly, and amounts are integrated into payroll for processing.

steps: Calculate prorated salaries considering leave periods and working day settings
Adjust payroll for leave periods spanning multiple months
what_to_do.expected_outcome: Leave salary transactions are accurately processed with correct prorated calculations and payroll adjustments.

what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: The report lacks flexible sorting, precise number formatting, and comprehensive employee data fields. It is generated on-the-go, restricting real-time customization.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Currency label mismatch on leave salary landing page
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: The landing page currency label is static and does not adapt to the company's configured currency, causing potential user confusion.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: No retroactive leave salary policy assignment
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Leave salary eligibility is determined at request creation time; policies assigned later do not affect existing requests.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Multiple leave requests for leaves spanning multiple cycles
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Leave salary requests are generated independently per leave cycle without consolidation, requiring manual tracking and approvals.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Lack of month-specific leave salary breakdown
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: The system shows aggregate leave salary calculation without detailed month-by-month day allocation for multi-month leaves.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Leave salary accrual affected by working days setting
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Daily wage calculator uses working days which causes monthly fluctuations in accrual calculations, leading to inconsistent totals.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Inconsistent leave salary report download for individual staff
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Users cannot directly download leave salary reports for specific staff members; manual workarounds via payroll reports are needed.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Lack of clear guidance on Leave Salary Encashment
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Users may misconfigure leave salary encashment due to unclear instructions on salary components and leave status during encashment.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Incomplete payroll templates missing absent days and leave salary details
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Payroll templates do not show absent days count or detailed leave salary policy amounts, limiting payroll validation.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Leave salary requests cannot be raised for cross-cycle leaves automatically
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Requests starting before the current payroll cycle cannot be processed automatically, requiring manual splitting.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Lack of integrated leave encashment management in Leave Salary page
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Users cannot create or manage leave encashment requests within the leave salary interface, limiting workflow completeness.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Inconsistent data synchronization between leave approval and payroll generation
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Not all approved leave requests propagate automatically to leave salary queue, causing incomplete payroll processing.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: No automated email notification for payroll managers on leave salary policy setup
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: Payroll managers are not automatically notified when new leave salary-enabled time off policies are configured, requiring manual communication.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Lack of comprehensive end-to-end tests for leave salary request generation
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: The system does not have full frontend test coverage for leave salary request workflows, limiting test reliability.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: Missing technical documentation for leave salary calculations
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: There is no comprehensive technical guide explaining leave salary calculation rules, reducing transparency.
Users cannot filter payroll data by leave salary, limiting reporting customization.

what_to_watch_out_for.issue: User confusion on leave salary transaction posting workflow
what_to_watch_out_for.limitation: The interface lacks intuitive guidance for posting leave salary transactions despite existing filtering functionality.
